name: Professor Calloway's Room of Traps
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 37.

Made with GameMaker Studio 2. No executable, must use GMS2 to open. (sorry)

Controls: WSAD

You are trapped in a room filled with turrets by the evil Professor Calloway. You must dodge bullets, lasers, and even Calloway himself!

Stage 1: Bullet Turrets

dodge bullets until the turrets run out of ammo and die.

Stage 2: Laser Turret

dodge laser as it rotates in a circle

Stage 3: Both turrets

Dodge bullets and rotating laser

Stage 4: Boss fight

Boss will shoot at you and charge at you. Avoid for 3 cycles to win.
